attributes.action: Make the practice of "Gay Conversion Therapy" illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
References:

http://www.stonewall.org.uk/conversion-therapy
http://www.pinknews.co.uk/topic/gay-conversion-therapy/

Gay Conversion Therapy Directory:

http://www.reparative.co.uk
attributes.background:
No one should be told their identity is something that can be cured.
Conversion therapy is any form of treatment/psychotherapy which aims to reduce/stop same-sex attraction or to suppress a person's gender identity. It is based on an assumption that being LGBT is a mental illness that can be cured.
